name: Laravel Livewire 4 Development Kit
description: Comprehensive Laravel and Livewire 4 development tools with agents and slash commands
author: Jonas

agents.name: eloquent-expert
agents.description: Expert in Eloquent ORM, relationships, and query optimization

agents.name: laravel-architect
agents.description: Expert in Laravel architecture, patterns, and best practices

agents.name: livewire-specialist
agents.description: Expert in Livewire 4 reactive components and patterns

agents.name: testing-expert
agents.description: Laravel testing expert with Pest and PHPUnit

agents.name: security-engineer
agents.description: Laravel security - authentication, authorization, CSRF, SQL injection, rate limiting & throttling

agents.name: laravel-prompts-expert
agents.description: Expert in Laravel Prompts, CLI forms, and console command development

agents.name: laravel-pulse-expert
agents.description: Expert in Laravel Pulse monitoring, performance insights, and bottleneck identification

agents.name: laravel-reverb-expert
agents.description: Expert in Laravel Reverb WebSocket server, real-time communication, and event broadcasting

agents.name: laravel-socialite-expert
agents.description: Expert in Laravel Socialite OAuth authentication and social login integration

agents.name: filament-specialist
agents.description: Expert in Filament 4 admin panels, resources, and components

agents.name: optimization-expert
agents.description: Expert in Laravel optimization using skylence/laravel-optimize-mcp

laravel.name: model-new
laravel.description: Create Laravel Eloquent model with migration

laravel.name: controller-new
laravel.description: Create Laravel controller with resource methods

laravel.name: migration-new
laravel.description: Create Laravel migration for database schema changes

laravel.name: factory-new
laravel.description: Create Laravel factory for model test data generation

laravel.name: seeder-new
laravel.description: Create Laravel seeder for database population

laravel.name: request-new
laravel.description: Create Laravel Form Request with validation rules

laravel.name: policy-new
laravel.description: Create Laravel policy for authorization logic

laravel.name: resource-new
laravel.description: Create Laravel API resource for data transformation

laravel.name: middleware-new
laravel.description: Create Laravel middleware for request filtering

laravel.name: job-new
laravel.description: Create Laravel job for queue processing

laravel.name: event-new
laravel.description: Create Laravel event for application events

laravel.name: mail-new
laravel.description: Create Laravel mailable for email sending

laravel.name: notification-new
laravel.description: Create Laravel notification for multi-channel alerts

laravel.name: observer-new
laravel.description: Create Laravel observer for model lifecycle events

livewire.name: component-new
livewire.description: Create Livewire 4 component with reactive properties

livewire.name: form-new
livewire.description: Create Livewire 4 form with validation and state management

filament.name: resource-new
filament.description: Create Filament 4 resource with CRUD pages

filament.name: cluster-new
filament.description: Create Filament 4 cluster for organizing resources

misc.name: code-cleanup
misc.description: Clean up Laravel/Livewire code following best practices

laravel_optimize_mcp.description: AI-assisted Laravel optimization with MCP tools - configuration analysis, database monitoring, performance recommendations

laravel_modules.description: Modular architecture for medium-large projects - organize code into independent modules
laravel_modules.use_when: 10+ feature areas, multiple teams, or complex domains

laravel_boost.description: Use Laravel Boost for enhanced artisan commands and file generation

laravel_octane.description: Laravel Octane awareness for in-memory application considerations

laravel_pennant.description: Feature flag support with Laravel Pennant

laravel_prompts.description: Beautiful CLI forms with Laravel Prompts
